Name: Bernie Sanders
Text: I stand in solidarity with Maximus workers walking out of federal call centers across the country today. To my mind, we should not allow greedy corporations to privatize public services or profit from robbing workers of fair pay and benefits.

Name: CWA

Today, @Maximus_news call center workers in the south are striking  for livable wages, paid sick leave for all, and the freedom to organize a union without interference.
